title: A Stranger In Everyone
description: Cory is not from an ordinary family. His mother is locked away and his father, a former sex offender, is on parole. When his father announces that they suddenly have to move, Cory knows that he has struck again. After his best friend disappears, Kevin notices that there is something wrong with his mother, but she denies it. When a police officer comes to talk to her, she tells Kevin to exercise his horse, but he eas-drops instead. He finds out what is wrong with his mother, and why his friend has disappeared. He also hears something even worse.This is a story about the multiple faces of one person and having hope and courage, despite the worst situations.Age Rang: 13+
author: Jesse Freedom
